channel.title: Dismissing Familiar
channel.description: Noob question, I had it, deleted it on accident *forgot how to do it* and now after googling it, turned to mopar. Not asking to be spoonfed, just can someone tell me/ help me when I click actionbutton: 66127 or button: 66127, it dismisses my familiar.

item.title: Dismissing Familiar
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

ClickingButtons.java

[code] case 94142:
if(c.lastsummon > 0) {
c.firstslot();
for(int i = 0; i < 29; i += 1) {
Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, c.storeditems[i], Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.summoningnpcid].absX, Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.summoningnpcid].absY, 1, c.playerId);
c.storeditems[i] = -1;
c.occupied[i] = false;
}
c.lastsummon = -1;
c.totalstored = 0;
c.summoningnpcid = 0;
c.summoningslot = 0;
c.storing = false;
c.sendMessage(“Your Pets bag contents have been dropped on the floor.”);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You do not have a pet summoned at the moment.”);
}
break;

		case 66127:
		if(c.lastsummon > 0) {
			c.firstslot();
		for(int i = 0; i < 29; i += 1) {
			Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, c.storeditems[i], Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.summoningnpcid].absX, Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.summoningnpcid].absY, 1, c.playerId);
			c.storeditems[i] = -1;
			c.occupied[i] = false;
		}
			c.lastsummon = -1;
			c.totalstored = 0;
			c.summoningnpcid = 0;
			c.summoningslot = 0;
			c.storing = false;
			c.sendMessage("Your Pets bag contents have been dropped on the floor.");
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You do not have a pet summoned at the moment.");
		}
		break;[/code]

Read full topic
